powers.name: Smashing!

attributes.value: Reloading within 6m of an enemy adds 20% of Max Ammo as extra Ammo
[Deadeye] eliminations reduce [Flashbang] max cooldown by 10%, up to 40% for the round
[Combat Roll] reduces [Flashbang] cooldown
[Deadeye] eliminations reward extra 500 Stadium Cash each
Deal 15% increased primary fire damage to enemies in the Damage role
[Flashbang] explosion radius is increased by 50%
Receives 25% less damage from enemy farther than 12m
Heal 10 Life for each Ammo loaded using [Combat Roll]

powers.name: Reload Therapy
powers.description: When you reload a shot, heal 3% of your Life

powers.name: Head Honcho
powers.description: Each unscoped shot you land increases the damage of the next scoped shot you land by 3%, up to 30%. Resets on reload

powers.name: My Business, My Rules
powers.description: When you deal damage to a Burning enemy with [The Viper], reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 10%

powers.name: Incendiary Rounds
powers.description: While scoped, hitting the same target without missing deals 30 extra damage

powers.name: Incendiary Blast
powers.description: [Coach Gun] applies Burning, dealing 100 damage over 5s. If target was burning, deal extra 75 additional Ability Damage instantly

powers.name: Calamity
powers.description: Using [Coach Gun] reloads 2 Ammo. [The Viper]'s next 2 hits deal 40 additional damage over 3s

powers.name: Double Barreled
powers.description: [Coach Gun] gains an additional charge

powers.name: Early Detonation
powers.description: Shooting [Dynamite] reloads 5 Ammo and reduces the cooldown of [Dynamite] by 3s

powers.name: Molten Munitions
powers.description: When [Dynamite] explodes on the ground, it leaves lava that Burns enemies for 50 every 1s

powers.name: Out with a Bang
powers.description: When [Dynamite] explodes, it spawns 3 sticky explosives that deal 66% reduced damage

powers.name: Partners in Crime
powers.description: You are healed for 100% of [B.O.B.]'s damage dealt and [B.O.B.] is healed for 100% of your damage dealt

powers.name: B.O.B. Jr.
powers.description: [B.O.B.] costs 50% less Ultimate Charge but has reduced Life, 50% reduced Attack Speed, and is significantly smaller

attributes.value: Gain 3% Attack Speed for each remaining Ammo above 50% of your Max Ammo
+5% Weapon Power, [The Viper], [Coach Gun], and [Dynamite] deal 10% more damage to enemies that are below you
When Burn gets removed instead of expiring, gain 3% Ultimate Charge
Damage dealt to Burning targets grants 20% more Ultimate Charge
After using [Coach Gun], gain 20% Move Speed for 3s
When the target is further than 10m, scoped shot gains 1% damage for each meter
When the target is within 10m, unscoped shot gains 15% increased damage
Deal 25% increased damage to Burning enemies
[Coach Gun] has 50% increased self-knockback
When [B.O.B.] finishes charging, [B.O.B.] gains 300 Armor
Your Burning effects gain 35% Lifesteal

powers.name: MediMaster
powers.description: [Mediblaster] can now critically hit both allies and enemies

powers.name: Stinger
powers.description: [Mediblaster] deals an additional 10 damage to enemies over 1s. (Does not stack)

powers.name: Cosmic Coolant
powers.description: [Pulsar Torpedoes] cooldown is reduced by 1s for each target it hits

powers.name: Medicinal Missiles
powers.description: [Pulsar Torpedoes] heal for an extra 30 life and causes allies hit to receive 50% more healing for 3s

powers.name: Pulsar Plus
powers.description: [Pulsar Torpedoes] gains 1 additional charge

powers.name: Torpedo Glide
powers.description: During [Glide Boost], every 50 damage you deal reduces the cooldown of [Pulsar Torpedoes] by 1s

powers.name: Blink Boosts
powers.description: [Glide Boost] gains 2 additional charges and has a 65% reduced cooldown, but has 75% reduced duration

powers.name: Rally Ring
powers.description: Reduce [Hyper Ring]'s cooldown by 1s when an ally passes through it

powers.name: Black Hole
powers.description: [Hyper Ring] slows the Move Speed of enemies who pass through it by 35% for 1s

powers.name: Hyper Healer
powers.description: Allies affected by [Hyper Ring] gain 50 Overhealth

powers.name: Stellar Focus
powers.description: [Orbital Ray] now follows you and its duration is increased by 35%

powers.name: Orbital Alignment
powers.description: Enemies inside of [Orbital Ray] lose 35% Move Speed. Allies inside of it gain 25% Move Speed

attributes.value: While airborne, [Mediblaster] deals 15% more damage
While aiming [Pulsar Torpedoes], gain Overhealth equal to 50% of your max Shields
[Mediblaster] deals 15% increased damage and healing to targets farther than 12m away
[Pulsar Torpedoes] explode on hit, deal 20 damage to nearby enemies
After using [Pulsar Torpedoes], gain 25% Attack Speed for 4s
+75 Shield, during [Glide Boost], gain 10% Damage Reduction
During [Glide Boost], gain 20% Attack Speed and your [Quick Melee] knocks enemies back
Allies affected by [Hyper Ring] restore 25 Shields every 1s
[Orbital Ray] gains 25% increased healing
When you use [Orbital Ray], reset your cooldowns

powers.name: Permafrost
powers.description: Increase your Max Health by 50% of your Ability Power

powers.name: Slowball
powers.description: [Endothermic Blaster]'s secondary fire now shoots a snowball that applies 30% slow for 1s on critical hit

powers.name: Extendothermics
powers.description: [Endothermic Blaster]'s primary fire range is increased by 6m

powers.name: Frost Armor
powers.description: Gain Armor equal to 5% of the primary fire damage you deal, up to 100, until the end of the round

powers.name: Snowball Flight
powers.description: Jumping while mid-air creates a large [Ice Wall] pillar under you. (12s Cooldown)

powers.name: Twice As Ice
powers.description: When you use [Cryo-Freeze], reset the next cooldown of [Ice Wall]

powers.name: Iceberg
powers.description: [Ice Wall] spawns a mini [Blizzard] that slows enemies

powers.name: Cryclone
powers.description: [Cryo-Freeze] spawns a mini [Blizzard] that slows enemies

powers.name: Coulder
powers.description: [Cryo-Freeze] now encases you in a rolling iceball that can knock back enemies and deal 10 damage

powers.name: Frost Nova
powers.description: When [Cryo-Freeze] ends, knock back nearby enemies, dealing 60 damage

powers.name: Blizznado
powers.description: While within [Blizzard], heal 5% of your Life every 1s

powers.name: Avalanche
powers.description: Visible enemies within 20m of the Blizzard are slowed by 25%

attributes.value: Primary Fire and [Blizzard] can remove burn
[Cryo-Freeze] duration is increased by 25%
Max Ammo is increased by 75% but reloading takes 50% longer
Frozen ground increases Mei's Movement Speed by 35%
While within [Blizzard], gain 10% Attack Speed
Ability Power is increased by 5% per each spawned Ice Pillars
On near death, go into [Cryo-Freeze] and gain 15% Ultimate Charge. Can happen once every round
[Blizzard] deals 100% increased damage
[Ice Wall] Duration is increased by 1 second and health is increased by 100%

powers.name: Fast Forward
powers.description: While above 50% Move Speed, increase damage by 25%

powers.name: Signature Shift
powers.description: After using an ability, your next [Sonic Amplifier] shot shoots a volley of 6 ammo with 20% increased projectile size

powers.name: Sonic Boom
powers.description: [Sonic Amplifier] Damage heals all allies affected by [Crossfade] equal to 20% of damage dealt

powers.name: Mixtape
powers.description: When switching to [Healing Boost], [Crossfade] heals for 50% of [Crossfade] healing for every 1s [Speed Boost] was active

powers.name: Megaphone
powers.description: +20% [Amp It Up] Duration. While [Amp It Up] is active, [Crossfade] radius is increased by 150%

powers.name: Radio Edit
powers.description: After using [Amp It Up], trigger [Sound Barrier] with 85% reduced Overhealth

powers.name: Vivace
powers.description: While [Wallriding] or airborne, [Soundwave] cooldown refreshes 25% faster and adds 1 Max Ammo per 1s until you reload

powers.name: Wallvibing
powers.description: While [Wallriding] or airborne, gain temporary Overhealth equal to 3% of your life every 1s up to 30%

powers.name: Crowd Pleaser
powers.description: After using [Soundwave], heal all allies affected by [Crossfade] for 200% of [Crossfade] healing.

powers.name: Let's Bounce
powers.description: [Soundwave] has 30% increased knockback and deals 40 bonus damage if the target hits a wall

powers.name: Reverb
powers.description: Gain 1 extra charge of [Soundwave]

powers.name: Beat Drop
powers.description: 20% Ultimate Cost Reduction. Landing on an enemy with [Sound Barrier] deals up to 200 damage

attributes.value: When allies leave your [Crossfade] area, the effect lingers for 2s
While in [Speed Boost], [Soundwave] also knocks you back
Environmental kills grant [Nano Boost] for 5s
After [Wallriding], gain 30% Move Speed for 2s
After using [Soundwave], your next [Quick Melee] grants decaying Overhealth equal to 200% of damage dealt
[Sonic Amplifier] projectiles ricochet off walls 3 times
[Sound Barrier] effectiveness is increased by 25% for every 1s [Sound Barrier] is channeled, up to 50%
After [Wallriding], gain an additonal jump while airborne
